name: Basic attractions cannot miss in Saigon center with an Angel
description: When visiting a city for the first time, you definitely do not want to miss the basic attractions in that city, which I believe can give you a general overview of the city geography and its every day lifestyle. Besides, you also have the chance to do some shopping and try PHO, one of our most famous food. What else should you do first thing when arriving in Saigon- overview of the city, try one local food, spend some time shopping and the chance to learn at least 10 basic Vietnamese expression.
